# [[parental control]], [[v-chip]] {{gloss|feature included in some digital television services, computers, mobile devices, software, etc. that allows parents to restrict their children's access to certain content}}
types.html:
contrôle parental m (uncountable)

  1. parental control, v-chip (feature included in some digital television services, computers, mobile devices, software, etc. that allows parents to restrict their children's access to certain content)

title: contrôle parental
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /kɔ̃.tʁol pa.ʁɑ̃.tal/
